publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-161.3 John Swinburne: Care Homes for the Elderly-As an amendment to motion (S2M-161) in the name of Mr David Davidson, leave out from "there is" to end and insert "means testing discriminates against residents who have made provision for their long-term care and calls on the Executive to provide long-term care for the elderly without such discrimination".
